LanguageData.TradingEconomyUpdate:
（译者注：以下这段是MOD作者的介绍和广告，所以直接机翻+原文过去）
The trading economy mod is now 2.0!!! >>交易经济现在是2.0 !!!
Finally, trading economy mod is now updated to B18. This is a pretty major update given how I managed to make some of the items that are never for sale, possible. Other than that Walkblem Galactic Corporation had enough with all the losses in goods and soldiers - they had sent their Walkblem Heavy Armored Infantry Carrier Vehicle as an unmanned armored caravan. They also withdrew most of their soldiers from escort duties and from the RimWorlds to reduce the amount of compensation that had been paying out over the calamitious A17 years. >>最后，贸易经济mod现在更新为B18。这是一个非常重要的更新，考虑到我如何设法使一些从未出售的物品，可能。除了这款Walkblem，银河公司已经拥有了足够的货物和士兵的损失，他们已经把他们的步行者重型装甲步兵运载工具作为无人驾驶的装甲车队。他们也撤回了大部分的士兵，从护送任务和从边缘世界减少了支付的补偿金额，这是在过去的17年。
Look out for the breakdown of all the caravans as well as their products on walkingproblem.com (will be updated soon). >>在walkingproblem.com(即将更新)中，注意所有的商队和他们的产品的崩溃。
Looking towards the future, we are looking at the possibility of making the Starship Troopers Federation mod (read: Mobile Infantry). >>展望未来，我们正在考虑是否有可能让星舰部队联邦mod(阅读:移动步兵)。
You can make this happen by buying a postcard or 2 on our website at www.walkingproblem.com. >>你可以在我们的网站www.walkingproblem.com上购买一张明信片或2张明信片。
Your purchase of this unique souvenir will allow me to spend more time working on the mods you love, instead of putting aside modding to find work for my web design, graphics design, seo and sem business to keep me alive. >>您购买这一独特的纪念品将让我花更多的时间在您喜欢的mods上，而不是为我的网页设计、图形设计、搜索引擎优化和sem业务寻找工作，让我活下去。
Do check out walkingproblem.com to find out more! And have fun!!! >>请登录walkingproblem.com了解更多!和玩得开心! ! !
